      • Memo

        public Memo(java.lang.String message,
            ECKeyPair keyPair,
            Address recipient,
            java.math.BigInteger nonce)

        Create Memo object with encrypted message

        Parameters:
        message - a message to send
        keyPair - sender keys, use ch.decent.sdk.crypto.Credentials.keyPair
        recipient - receiver public key, use address from Account.active keys
        nonce - unique positive number
